metadata.Title: CVE-2020-12797 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description:
HashiCorp Consul and Consul Enterprise failed to enforce changes to legacy ACL token rules due to non-propagation to secondary data centers. Introduced in 1.4.0, fixed in 1.6.6 and 1.7.4.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-12797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

consul - 1.7.4+dfsg1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: consul package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.7.4+dfsg1-1').
